模块 Chen.Yutian.Intellij.Java12
程序包 Movement

类 Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.image.ImageView
        • Movement.Actor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    直接已知子类:
    Animal, BackgroundImage, Digit, End, Image, Log, Obstacle, Turtle, WetTurtle
    public abstract class Actor
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
    Parent class that define the objects (animal and obstacles) in the game Provide the method to check if two object crash Provide interface of action for each sub class AnimalBackgroundDigitEndImageLogObstacleTurtleWetTurtle

      • getIntersectingObjects

        public <A extends Actor> java.util.List<A> getIntersectingObjects​(java.lang.Class<A> cls)
        Check if one object bumps into other objects
        类型参数:
        A - Genericity that defines which element to input
        参数:
        cls - The object that wants to check
        返回:
        the list of object that had intersection with the input object

      • manageInput

        public void manageInput​(javafx.scene.input.InputEvent e)

      • getOneIntersectingObject

        public <A extends Actor> A getOneIntersectingObject​(java.lang.Class<A> cls)
        Check if the input object bumps into another and return that
        类型参数:
        A - Genericity that defines which element to input
        参数:
        cls - The input object that wants to check
        返回:
        The object that has Intersection with input object

      • act

        public abstract void act​(long now)
        Interface that define the detail movement of each sub object
        参数:
        now - The gaming time
